sentences.en: A cabaret is a restaurant providing food, drink, and often a floor show.
sentences.cn: “卡巴莱”夜总会是一种供应食物 、 饮料并经常有歌舞表演的餐厅.

sentences.en: Agriculture has developed rapidly, thus providing light industry with ample raw materials.
sentences.cn: 农业迅速发展, 从而为轻工业提供了充足的原料.

sentences.en: Before providing the cash, they will have to decide whether you are a good or bad risk.
sentences.cn: 在提供资金之前，他们得确认你是不是信誉良好的贷款对象。

sentences.en: Ferry companies are providing extra sailings from Calais.
sentences.cn: 渡船公司加开了从加来出发的航班。

sentences.en: He wants to make sure that schools are committed to providing alternative education.
sentences.cn: 他想确保学校尽力提供新型教育。

sentences.en: I'm keen on providing signers for deaf people and readers for the blind.
sentences.cn: 我热心于为聋哑人提供手语员，为盲人提供朗读员。

sentences.en: Mindful of the needs of its students, Cardiff has invested heavily in providing new and improved residences.
sentences.cn: 考虑到学生的需要，加的夫大学投入了巨资兴建和改善学生宿舍。

sentences.en: More and more restaurants are providing non-smoking areas.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的餐厅开始辟出无烟区。

sentences.en: Newspapers, television and radio are all providing saturation coverage.
sentences.cn: 报纸、电视和电台全都在铺天盖地地报道。

sentences.en: Providing they do not panic, I believe that their chances of survival will be beyond 95 per cent.
sentences.cn: 如果他们不慌乱，我相信他们生还的概率将在95%以上。

sentences.en: Scarcely a week goes by without the news providing fresh examples of police racism.
sentences.cn: 几乎每周都有关于警方种族歧视事件的新闻报道。

sentences.en: Supermarkets often claim that they are responding to the wants of consumers by providing packaged foods.
sentences.cn: 超市经常声称他们根据消费者的需要提供包装食品。

sentences.en: The city is providing free transportation to the stadium from downtown.
sentences.cn: 本市现在提供从市中心到体育场的免费交通。

sentences.en: The larger firm was capable of providing a better range of services.
sentences.cn: 较大的公司能够提供一系列更好的服务。

sentences.en: The spade and fork have longer shafts, providing better leverage.
sentences.cn: 锹和耙的手柄较长，可发挥较好的杠杆作用。

sentences.en: You can borrow the car, providing I can have it back by six o’clock.
sentences.cn: 你可以借用我的车，只要6点钟以前还给我就行。

phrases.tran_cn: 供养，供给；规定；为…作准备

trans.tran_cn: 如果，假如，在…条件下，倘若
提供，供给，供应( provide的现在分词)，规定，提供[(+for)]，装备
